EmailTemplate.description: This is send to Staffing Associate record owner assessment invitation is not sent
EmailTemplate.name: SF to Staffing Associate assessment invitation email not sent
EmailTemplate.subject: Error: assessment invitation email was not sent
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.OwnerFirstName},
The assessment invitation email that you just tried to send to {!Job_Application__c.Contact_Name__c} did not go through, as either the Cluster or the Role is missing on their Job Application. Please click on this click to view and update the Job Application: {!Job_Application__c.Link} Once you have done this, you can resend the assessment invitation email.
Thanks, Central Operations
This is a standard email, sent automatically when someone tries to send a assessment invitation email without the required information.
